description:
The United States and the United Kingdom have for decades been described as having a special relationship. But there's been another sign that the phrase coined by Winston Churchill more than 60 years ago might no longer reflect political reality. The US has given the UK a very public slap on the wrist for backing a new Chinese investment bank. It's seen as a potential rival to the Washington-based World Bank. Now it's all being couched in diplomatic language of course. The US administration has publicly said it's concerned about the British government's decision to become a founding member of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank. So is the US just throwing a hissy fit because a good friend has joined a new gang or could this really signal a change to the US power base? I got the view from Matthew Goodman, senior adviser for Asian Economics, the Centre for Strategic and International Studies.

That's a new initiative by the Chinese government to fill some of the big gap in infrastructure spending in the Asia-Pacific region. So they announced this last summer and they tried to recruit other countries in the region to contribute to this as well. And I think that there is a real need for a greater infrastructure and the Chinese were trying to fill it. It does raise some questions about how it will work alongside existing institutions like the Asian Development Bank and the World Bank, which do similar things. But I think that's what it was aimed to do.

title: 英美好基友关系紧张（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

他用这首感人的歌献给这位“疯子”凡高，在感动其本人的同时，也感动了全世界热爱生活， 心存希望的人们。在荷兰阿姆斯特丹的凡高纪念馆前，人们总能听到这首歌，她一遍一遍的放着，永远让人感动，让人怀念。

模唱：

讲解：

Starry starry night
Paint your palette blue and gray
Look out on a summer's day
With eyes that know the darkness in my soul
Shadows on the hills
Sketch the trees and the daffodils
Catch the breeze and the winter chills
In colors on the snowy linen land

Now I understand
What you tried to say to me
How you suffered for your sanity
How you tried to set them free
They would not listen they did not know how
Perhaps they'll listen now

伴奏：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
